verses.verse: [b]Give thanks to the LORD, for he is good, for his love endures forever.
Give thanks to the God of gods, for his love endures forever.
Give thanks to the LORD of lords, for his love endures forever.
He alone works great wonders, for his love endures forever.
[c]In his wisdom he made the heavens, for his love endures forever.
He spread out the earth upon the waters,[d] for his love endures forever.
He made the great lights, for his love endures forever.
He made the sun to rule over the day, for his love endures forever.
He made the moon and stars to rule the night, for his love endures forever.
[e]He struck down the firstborn of Egypt, for his love endures forever.
He led forth Israel from among them, for his love endures forever.
He did so with a strong hand and outstretched arm, for his love endures forever.
[f]He divided the Red Sea in two, for his love endures forever.
Then he led Israel through its midst, for his love endures forever.
But he swept Pharaoh and his army into the Red Sea, for his love endures forever.
[g]Then he led his people through the wilderness, for his love endures forever.
He struck down great kings, for his love endures forever.
He slew powerful kings, for his love endures forever.
Sihon, king of the Amorites, for his love endures forever.
Og, king of Bashan, for his love endures forever.
[h]He gave their land as a heritage, for his love endures forever.
The heritage was for his servant Israel, for his love endures forever.
The LORD remembered us in our wretched state, for his love endures forever.
He rescued us from our enemies, for his love endures forever.
[i]He provides food to every creature, for his love endures forever.
Give thanks to the God of heaven, for his love endures forever.
